title: Will Riot Ever Stop Punishing The Community They Wanted?
body: Ok Riot lets be honest YOU built this community, from your bans/game updates/rules/mods...right? i mean if im wrong about this then plz explain. Since you have already stated there will be no solo Q, Is there any chance u will change the ranking system? I mean give me and the other 100k+ players who follow your (imo) BS rules, a break....Im tired of being responsible to carry 4 other members of my team 90% of my games. its tiring its bs and its not how a competetive game should be run. So im just asking Will you ever change how you judge the ranking system?

replies.body: Lol this is how their system is set and will probably stay that way sorry m8
most likely they will never change, whoever they have running this game, is really running it into the ground imo
Sad to say its been So many years now that a change isnt in site, they will probably do what jagex did and change whoever is running the shit into the ground WHEN it is TOO LATE!
A team game requires a team to win.  If anything, I'd think you'd like dynamic queue since you can choose at least some of your teammates now.
